com.ontotext.jape.automaton

Class TripleTransitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontotext.jape.automaton.TripleTransitions

  • public class TripleTransitions
extends Object
    This class is used for the conversion from FSM to Automaton and from Automaton to FSM.
    Author:
    petar.mitankin
